title: K_os
author: K_os
content: WTB if you have any magazine 2011-2014 that has a Bitcoin article or on the cover bitcoin.I may or may not have it please post what you have.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: K_os on August 10, 2023, 09:13:29 PMWTB if you have any magazine 2011-2014 that has a Bitcoin article or on the cover bitcoin.I may or may not have it please post what you have.Maybe easier if you post what you are looking for versus what you already have....or vice-versa.. if we know what you have, can avoid receiving offers for duplicates

comments.author: TheNovemberMan
comments.body: I have:The New Yorker - October, 2011Time - April 2013New Scientist - February, 2014Dogecoin Magazine - May, 2014YBitcoin - Bitcoin Bowl Issues

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: A few you may be interested in up for sale/trade:- Bloomberg Businessweek Jan 2014 - Bitcoin Dreams, CGC graded 7- Omni June 1991 - The Future of Money: One World-One Economy- Wired Aug 1996 - The Egos at id- yBitcoin - Summer 2014 - Wall Street Bullish on Bitcoin- The Economist Oct-Nov 2015 - The trust machinePM me for pics/interest/offers.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: You may want to have a look at this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5148433.160It’s a pretty comprehensive list of magazines, newspapers etc related to Bitcoin. Have a look through and see what you’re missing (I might have a few you may want )

comments.author: K_os
comments.body: Below are the Magazines I need if you have any send me a message.Bitcoin Bowl Program - December 2014Code - September 2014Finweek Magazine - June 2011Raconteur / The Times 2011New Science - June 2011New Scientist - January 2012New Scientist - February 2014Hackin9 - January 2011The Spectator - November 2013The Economist - January 1988The Economist - June 2011 - bits and bobThe Nation - May 2014

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: I am also in search of the Newsweek Magazine from 2014 "Bitcoin's face"

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: K_os on August 10, 2023, 09:13:29 PMWTB if you have any magazine 2011-2014 that has a Bitcoin article or on the cover bitcoin.I may or may not have it please post what you have.If you are interested also in material not in English, I can offer this magazine: "Rivista Italiana di Intelligence [Italian Intelligence Magazine] Release Date: 2° Quarter 2012"https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5148433.msg60426644#msg60426644I have an additional copy available for selling, and this is one of the first printed magazine ever created in Italy related bitcoin.

comments.author: TheNovemberMan
comments.body: @K_os - I have a CGC Graded 7.0 - New Scientist, February 2014

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Howdy....have a few of these if interested in one...I can part with one.   Volume Twenty-Eight, Number One! / 2600 THE HACKER QUARTERLYNotable article: How To Accept Payments Anonymously - A Digital Currency GuideRelease Date: Spring 2011

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Definitely got a Raconteur - will dig it out in the next few days - no idea what these are selling for - never seen these for sale on the forum or anywhere else??Finweek - rare as rocking horse shit ! I managed some correspondence with the author many years ago and he hasn’t got any copies  Anyone seen any in the wild ?

comments.author: StackItUp
comments.body: i have The New Yorker - October, 2011
